content.question: What is the purpose of the probation period for regular/permanent staff?

answers.option: To review performance and determine confirmation, extension, or improvement plans.
To avoid providing benefits during the first year.
To allow staff to work without supervision.
To test only academic qualifications without performance evaluation.

content.correct: Correct! Probation ensures performance review and suitability before confirmation.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answer is: To review performance and determine confirmation, extension, or improvement plans.
